metadata.synopsis: AD for a flaming fist in Baldur's Gate bridge, yelling people to stay in the line.

0.speaker: Fist Qirahe
0.text: Stay in line. And stop jostling!
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to keep the queue under control (somewhat aggressively)

1.speaker: Fist Qirahe
1.text: If you start fighting, you can deal with it yourselves!
1.context: NodeContext: Trying to keep the queue under control (somewhat aggressively)
